languages.text: {n}Простирая мехадендрит в сторону Нихель, Паскаль изрекает:{/n} "Техносестра, я Осуждаю тебя и твои действия. Вмешательство в процедуру недопустимо. Саботаж эксперимента — кощунство. За предательство твои жизненные функции будут прекращены, именем Мессии Прерывания". {n}Внутри аугментов Паскаля рождается импульс зеленоватой энергии, яростной молнией устремляющийся к Нихель.{/n}

{n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Простирая мехадендрит в сторону Нихель, Паскаль изрекает:{/n} "Техносестра, я Осуждаю тебя и твои действия. Вмешательство в процедуру недопустимо. Саботаж эксперимента — кощунство. За предательство твои жизненные функции будут прекращены, именем Мессии Прерывания". {n}Внутри аугментов Паскаля рождается импульс зеленоватой энергии, яростной молнией устремляющийся к Нихель.{/n}

Tampering with the procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is a sacrilege. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics, and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは機械触手をニヘルに向かって伸ばし、発生する。{/n}「技術同胞よ、あなたとその行動に対する審判は、一種の有罪宣告となる。手順に干渉することは許されない。実験の妨害は背教とも言える。それらの裏切り行為から、あなたの生命機能を廃絶の救世主の名の下に停止する」{n}緑色のエネルギーパルスがパスカルのオーグメティック内部で生成されると、怒りの雷撃のごとくニヘルめがけて飛んでいく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは機械触手をニヘルに向かって伸ばし、発生する。{/n}「技術同胞よ、あなたとその行動に対する審判は、一種の有罪宣告となる。手順に干渉することは許されない。実験の妨害は背教とも言える。それらの裏切り行為から、あなたの生命機能を廃絶の救世主の名の下に停止する」{n}緑色のエネルギーパルスがパスカルのオーグメティック内部で生成されると、怒りの雷撃のごとくニヘルめがけて飛んでいく。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡向妮赫尔伸出了一条机械触须，宣布道。{/n}“技术姐妹，我的判断是，你的行为应当受到谴责。篡改程序不可接受，破坏实验属于叛教行为。以终结的弥赛亚之名，你将因你的背叛而被终止生命功能。”{n}帕斯卡的植入物射出了绿色的能量脉冲，仿佛狂暴的闪电一样冲向妮赫尔。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡向雅珀伸出了一条机械触须，宣布道。{/n}“技术姐妹，我的判断是，你的行为应当受到谴责。篡改程序不可接受，破坏实验属于叛教行为。以终结的弥赛亚之名，你将因你的背叛而被终止生命功能。”{n}帕斯卡的植入物射出了绿色的能量脉冲，仿佛狂暴的闪电一样冲向雅珀。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal déploie une mécadendrite vers Nihel et annonce :{/n} « Technoconsœur, mon jugement concernant vos agissements est une condamnation. Modifier la procédure est inacceptable. Saboter l'expérience est une apostasie. Pour vous punir de votre trahison, vos fonctions vitales vont être arrêtées au nom du Messie de l'Interruption. » {n}Une impulsion d'énergie verte, née des augmétiques de Pasqal, se précipite soudain vers Nihel à la vitesse de l'éclair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal déploie une mécadendrite vers Nihel et annonce :{/n} « Technoconsœur, mon jugement concernant vos agissements est une condamnation. Modifier la procédure est inacceptable. Saboter l'expérience est une apostasie. Pour vous punir de votre trahison, vos fonctions vitales vont être arrêtées au nom du Messie de l'Interruption. » {n}Une impulsion d'énergie verte, née des augmétiques de Pasqal, se précipite soudain vers Nihel à la vitesse de l'éclair.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal extiende una mecadendrita hacia Nihel y pronuncia lo siguiente:{/n} «Tecnohermana, mi Juicio sobre ti y tus acciones es de condena. Manipular el procedimiento es un acto intolerable. Sabotear el experimento es apostasía. Por tu traición, perderás tus funciones vitales en el nombre del Mesías de la Discontinuidad». {n}Dentro de los auméticos de Pasqal comienza a brillar un pulso verdoso de energía y se lanza hacia Nihel como un poderoso rayo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal extiende una mecadendrita hacia Nihel y pronuncia lo siguiente:{/n} «Tecnohermana, mi Juicio sobre ti y tus acciones es de condena. Manipular el procedimiento es un acto intolerable. Sabotear el experimento es apostasía. Por tu traición, perderás tus funciones vitales en el nombre del Mesías de la Discontinuidad». {n}Dentro de los auméticos de Pasqal comienza a brillar un pulso verdoso de energía y se lanza hacia Nihel como un poderoso rayo.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal streckt einen Mechadendriten in Nihels Richtung aus und verkündet:{/n} "Tech-Schwester, hier ist mein Richtspruch über Euch und Eure Taten: Ich verdamme Euch. Jede Einmischung in die Prozedur ist inakzeptabel. Die Sabotage des Experiments ist Apostasie. Für Euren Verrat werden im Namen des Messias der Unterbrechung Eure Vitalfunktionen terminiert." {n}Ein grünlicher Energieimpuls wird in Pasqals Augmentationen geboren und schießt wie ein wütender Blitz auf Nihel zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal streckt einen Mechadendriten in Nihels Richtung aus und verkündet:{/n} "Tech-Schwester, hier ist mein Richtspruch über Euch und Eure Taten: Ich verdamme Euch. Jede Einmischung in die Prozedur ist inakzeptabel. Die Sabotage des Experiments ist Apostasie. Für Euren Verrat werden im Namen des Messias der Unterbrechung Eure Vitalfunktionen terminiert." {n}Ein grünlicher Energieimpuls wird in Pasqals Augmentationen geboren und schießt wie ein wütender Blitz auf Nihel zu.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, bir mekadentritini Nihel'e uzatıp resmî bir edayla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sana ve eylemlerine yönelik Hükmüm, suçlu olduğun yönündedir tekno kardeşim. Prosedüre engel oluşun kabul edilemez. Deneyi sabote etmek, dine küfürdür. İhanetin sebebiyle, Bozulum Mesihi adına hayati fonksiyonların sonlandırılacaktır." {n}Pasqal'ın ogmetiğinin içinden doğan yeşilimsi bir enerji dalgası, şiddetli bir yıldırıma dönüşüp ok misali Nihel'e atılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal extends a mechadendrite toward Nihel and pronounces,{/n} "Tech-sister, my Judgement of you and your actions is one of condemnation. Tampering with procedure is unacceptable. Sabotaging the experiment is apostasy. For your betrayal, your vital functions will be terminated in the name of the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}A greenish pulse of energy is born inside Pasqal's augmetics and darts toward Nihel like a furious lightning bolt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, Nihel'e doğru bir mekadentrit uzatıyor ve resmî bir edayla konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Tekno kardeşim, sana ve eylemlerine yönelik Hüküm'üm suçlu olduğun yönündedir. Prosedüre engel olmak kabul edilemez. Deneyi sabote etmek dine küfürdür. İhanetin sebebiyle, Devamsızlık Mesihi adına hayati fonksiyonların sonlandırılacaktır." {n}Pasqal'ın ogmetiğinin içinden doğan yeşilimsi bir enerji dalgası, şiddetli bir yıldırım hâline gelip Nihel'e ok gibi fırlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
